alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Medina; Uvalde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 11:08PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Medina, southwestern Bandera and northeastern Uvalde Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Concan to 10 miles south of Utopia to near Sabinal. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tarpley, Sabinal, Utopia, Concan, Hill Country State Natural Area, Lakehills and Lake Medina Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Texas.
